fr.exanpe.t5.lib.components
Class VerticalMenu

java.lang.Object
  fr.exanpe.t5.lib.components.VerticalMenu
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.tapestry5.ClientElement
@Import(library={"${exanpe.yui2-base}/yahoo-dom-event/yahoo-dom-event.js","js/exanpe-t5-lib.js"},
        stylesheet={"css/exanpe-t5-lib-core.css","css/exanpe-t5-lib-skin.css"})
@SupportsInformalParameters
@Events(value="selectVerticalMenuItem")
public class VerticalMenu
extends Object
implements org.apache.tapestry5.ClientElement

VerticalMenu component.
Items must be provided as body of this component (Loop of VerticalMenuItem).
JavaScript : This component is bound to a class Exanpe.VerticalMenu.
CSS : This component is bound to a class exanpe-vmenu.

Since:
1.1
Author:
lguerin
See Also:
